title: Fatal Counterattack - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Modern Knowledge   Murders   Mystery Solving   Police
author: Nian Fei Nian   年非年
description:
This is a book of mysteries and deductions.

Revealing the most realistic bloodshed while using the most thrilling strategies. A storm of intertwined secrets is about to be uncovered.

Watch how the derelict young man, Zhang Zichen, uses his ultimate logical reasoning to battle the complex scheme.

Since it all started because of me, then I will use my eyes to solve the mysteries of the entire world!>
